file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-11-00-05 - MAIN-DOOR ACTUATING AND LOCKING MECHANISM - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR ACTUATING AND LOCKING MECHANISM - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the functional check of the actuating, latching, and locking mechanism of the main door. B. These procedures are applicable to the locking and unlocking simulations of the main door with the internal and external handles. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN-DOOR ACTUATING LATCHING AND AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- 52-11-00-700-801-A ♦ LOCKING MECHANISM - FUNCTIONAL STAIRS DOOR CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-11-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-11-00-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 2. MAIN-DOOR ACTUATING LATCHING AND LOCKING MECHANISM - FUNCTIONAL CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the functional check of the actuating, latching, and locking mechanism of the main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION MAIN-DOOR STEP ACTUATING MECHANISM - AD- AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-802-A/500 JUSTMENT MAIN-DOOR INTERCONNECTING RODS - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-803-A/500 MENT AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-804-A/500 MAIN-DOOR LOCKING-MECHANISM CAMS - TEST AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-805-A/500 MAIN DOOR CABLES - ADJUSTMENT AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-806-A/500 MAIN DOOR ROLLERS - ADJUSTMENT MAIN DOOR-TO-FUSELAGE SKIN GAP - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-807-A/500 MENT MAIN DOOR-TO-FUSELAGE SKIN STEP - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-808-A/500 MENT AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-809-A/500 MAIN DOOR STOPS - ADJUSTMENT AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-811-A/500 MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - ADJUSTMENT C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Functional Check of Main-Door Actuating, Latching, and Locking Mechanism SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Do a functional check of the actuating, latching, and locking mechanism of the main door as follows: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 52-11-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) Adjust the main door step actuating mechanism ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-802- A/500). (b) Adjust the main-door interconnecting rods ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-803-A/ 500). (c) Adjust the main-door locking-mechanism cams ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-804- A/500). (d) Adjust the main door cables ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-805-A/500). (e) Adjust the main door rollers ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-806-A/500). (f) Adjust the main door-to-fuselage skin gap ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-807-A/ 500). (g) Adjust the main door-to-fuselage skin step ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-808-A/ 500). (h) Adjust the main door stops ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-809-A/500). (i) Adjust the main-door folding flap ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-811-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 52-11-00 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
